panels.description: Particulate counts displayed in log scale

targets.query:
import "math"
from(bucket: "SharedAirDFW")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "IPS7100")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pc10_0")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_name"] == "${device_name}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: math.log10(x: r._value + 1.0) }))
  |> yield(name: "last")

import "math"
from(bucket: "SharedAirDFW")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "IPS7100")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pc5_0")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_name"] == "${device_name}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
      |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: math.log10(x: r._value + 1.0) }))

  |> yield(name: "last")

panels.title: Particulate Size Distribution as Number Density (Counts/Sec)

targets.query:
from(bucket: "SharedAirDFW")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_name"] == "${device_name}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "BME280")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "temperature")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "SharedAirDFW")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_name"] == "${device_name}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "BME680")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "temperature")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_name"] == "${device_name}")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value >= ${Confidence})
  |> drop(columns: ["device_id", "device_name"])
  |> count()
  |> group()
  |> sort(desc: true)

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "VEML6075")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "uvb")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value/200.0}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "SharedAirDFW")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "MBC001")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_name"] == "${device_name}")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value >= ${Confidence})
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 15m , fn: count)
  |> sort(desc: true)
  |> drop(columns: ["device_id", "device_name","_start","_stop", "_measurement"])
  |> group()
  
  |> sort(desc: true)

import "math"
from(bucket: "SharedAirDFW")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "GPGGA")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "latitude")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_name"] == "${device_name}")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: +(math.floor(x: r._value/100.00) +  (r._value - 100.00*math.floor(x: r._value/100.00))/60.00) }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "SharedAirDFW")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "longitudeCoordinate")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_name"] == "${device_name}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

import "math"
from(bucket: "SharedAirDFW")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "longitude")

  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: -(math.floor(x: r._value/100.00) +  (r._value - 100.00*math.floor(x: r._value/100.00))/60.00) }))
